title: Will Nintendo Shadow Drop An Indie Game?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.14.21
description:
Blessing and Tam talk about Nintendo's suprise Indie World Presentation, Halo playlist updates, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:15 - Housekeeping
This is our last week of regular content for the year before we go on break!
The Blessing Show will be the last piece of Kinda Funny Games content of the year and that goes up on Monday the 20th.
We’ll be back on January 3rd.
PSILY XOXO episode 100 is out now and it celebrates with the second annual PlayStation Awards for the year. That’s live for everyone on Tuesday over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, & Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now!
The Roper Report  -
00:10:55 - Nintendo Indie World Presentation Announced For December 15 – GameSpot, Jason Fanelli
00:18:50 - Nintendo Switch Was The Best-Selling Console In The US In November – GameSpot, Darryn Bonthuys
00:24:12 - Halo updates
00:31:00 - Ad
00:35:40 - Official Xbox Red Ring Of Death Poster Is Now For Sale – GameSpot, Jason Fanelli
00:45:20 - Some Halo Infinite Players Are Suffering a Save-Wiping Glitch – IGN, Jared Moore
00:52:30 - Out today
00:58:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
